title: Funerary inscription for Iulia Florentina
support:
A slab of Luna marble, partly corroded in the centre. Slighty convex in form
                                        (thinner at the edges). Intact on all sides. The rear is unfinished.

layout.p: Thirteen lines of Latin text, filling the available space.

handNote.lettering: Deeply engraved letters, somewhat irregular in height. A is consistently rendered without cross-bar. There is some fluidity between E, L, I and T, either one for the other, or simply rendered by a vertical stroke. Occasional use of ligatures. No interpunctuation.

date._: First quarter of the 4th century CE (on the basis of the office of 'corrector')

provenanceFound._: Found in July 1730, exact provenance not clear, but likely in the area of the necropolis immediately north of Piazza Stesicoro, either in the vicinity of the basilica on via Dott. Consoli, or else along via Sant'Euplio

graphics.desc: Image reproduced from the Louvre website according to terms and conditions (© 2007 Musée du Louvre, Dist. GrandPalaisRmn / Daniel Lebée/CarineDeambrosis)
ISicily with the permission of the Museo Civico di Catania; image of cast, photo by students of Liceo Lazzaro, 2017-04-27
